hotels.title: Northwest Denver Retreat Near Rocky Flats with 27-Hole Championship Golf Course, Two Resort Pools & Five Restaurants
hotels.description: Experience the majesty of the Rocky Mountain during a stay at this resort, perfectly positioned between Denver and Boulder. Indulge in an array of outdoor activities, from teeing off at the 27-hole championship golf course to exploring nearby wildlife refuges like Rocky Flats and Standley Lake. rejuvenating treatments at Mokara Spa. Enjoy variety in dining, from elegance at Meritage to the more casual Fairways and The Tap Room Restaurant and Bar. Flatiron Crossing offers shopping and entertainment nearby, while the resort itself offers rejuvenating treatments at Mokara Spa and two outdoor pools and a hot tub open year-round.

hotels.title: Contemporary Denver Urban Retreat in Fashionable Northern Arts District
hotels.description: Experience living like a RiNo local and immerse yourself in Denver's vibrant Northern Arts District at the boutique Catbird Hotel. Blending the line between hotel and home, this welcoming space is all about those added extras: enjoy panoramic city and mountain views while you unwind with a drink at lively rooftop bar and lounge The Red Barber, or take yourself to every must-see site on a stylish Vespa available to rent at the Playroom. Whether your stay is for work or play, Catbird Hotel is your gateway to Denver's eclectic cultural scene.

hotels.title: Denver Hotel in Prime Downtown Hotspot for Entertainment, Shopping & Sports
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the distinctive Colorado buzz at Kimpton Hotel Monaco Denver, an IHG Hotel, in the heart of Downtown. Be charmed by warm, signature Kimpton service, recharge with complimentary coffee and a nightly wine hour, and dine at onsite Panzano Italian restaurant. Keep your routine in check with a 24-hour fitness centre or hire an e-bike to explore the buzzing entertainment, shopping and sports culture of Denver.
